DOC.detailed_description: A propose 12 patient recruited participation pilot study . Consenting patient age 18-65 year old confirm chronic migraine ( defined International Headache Society criterion ) meeting inclusion criterion ( describe full protocol ) enrol participation trial . Participants currently receive migraine prophylaxis taper specified medication ( taper regimen determine clinician ) 4-week washout period observe prior baseline assessment Botox treatment . These patient permit use acute migraine medication require . Participants undergo baseline migraine significance assessment , include Headache Impact Test ( HIT-6 ) , Migraine Disability Assessment ( MIDAS ) questionnaire Migraine Impact Questionnaire . Baseline neurological assessment also conduct visit . Additionally , baseline Beck Depression Anxiety Inventories complete . Participants also undergo baseline fMRI 3Tesla Siemens MRI magnet National Research Council ( NRC ) Building locate 435 Ellice Avenue Winnipeg , Manitoba . At time , structural rest state fMRI data acquire . A 72-hour minimum migraine-free period ensure individual allow proceed imaging . A localizer image obtain . This use determine participant 's head position set field view subsequent image . Next , high-resolution 3-dimensional image take whole brain . This acquire follow image parameter [ Siemens MP-RAGE sequence , 1mm thick slice , zero spacing slice , repetition time 1900 m , echo time 2.2 m , plane resolution 0.94 x 0.94 , 256 x 256 matrix size 24 cm field view , 176 volume , result 8 minute 6 second scan time ] . After high-resolution image acquire , rest state fMRI data acquire follow parameter [ Siemens echo planar imaging ( EPI ) sequence , 3 mm thick slice , zero spacing slice , repetition time 3000 m , echo time 30 m , flip angle 90Â° , 64 x 64 matrix size , 24 cm field view , 140 volume , result 7 minute 9 second scan time ] . This provide data set functional connectivity analysis . The high-resolution anatomical data serf background display superimpose rest state fMRI data . All image data acquire alpha-numeric code represent study protocol number participant number ; data transfer flash drive copy principal investigator 's hard drive analysis . All participant paperwork data back-up securely store principal investigator 's locked filing cabinet . Following baseline screening , participant receive two subsequent treatment botulinum-A toxin , separate 12 week . Participants receive standardize botulinum-A toxin dose chronic migraine prophylaxis , comprise 155 total unit give 31 specify site across 7 head/neck muscle ( protocol explicitly describe full protocol ) . Second dose botulinum-A toxin either maintain 155 total unit dose initially , increase 195 total unit , depend response clinical questionnaire examination evaluate response efficacy ( describe full protocol , consistent `` Follow-the-Pain Injection Paradigm '' ) . Following initial treatment ( Day=0 ) participant request maintain daily headache diary , ask record symptom active migraine well use acute migraine medication daily basis , order track migraine frequency severity ( example headache diary include full protocol ) . Participant timeline follow : Day 0 ( baseline assessment , fMRI first Botox injection ) , Day 28 ( clinic follow-up ) , Day 56 ( second fMRI ) , Day 84 ( clinic follow-up second injection ) , Day 112 ( clinic follow-up ) Day 140 ( third fMRI ) . Clinic follow-up schedule Days 28 , 84 112 time adverse event review , well headache frequency report daily headache diary . At time point , participant also repeat assessment complete baseline visit , include HIT-6 , MIDAS Migraine Impact Questionnaire . At study termination ( Day=140 ) patient undergo final fMRI scan per baseline MRI protocol previously describe .
DOC.criteria: Female male patient , 1865 year age confirm chronic migraine ( defined migraine headache without aura , occur > 15 day month least 3 month Headaches must least two follow characteristic : unilateral location , pulsate quality , moderatesevere pain intensity and/or aggravation cause avoidance routine physical activity ( eg . Walking climb stair ) Headaches must also least one : nausea and/or vomit photophobia and/or phonophobia . Patients must cognitively able understand questionnaire able complete Headache Logs . Patients must physically able undergo treatment administration , include require positional change need administration . Headaches could attribute cause , determine clinician , include medication overuse headaches chronic tension type headache . Females childbearing age confirm suspected pregnancy , plan conceive trial duration woman breastfeed . Previous treatment botulinum toxinA chronic migraine . Confirmed allergy botulinum toxinA product component . Contraindications fMRI procedure . Patients unable discontinue migraine prophylaxis medication , include tricyclic antidepressant , betablockers various antiepileptic medication , either due unwillingness safety issue ( eg . Antiepileptics use manage seizure disorder ) . This determined clinician . Participants exhibit severe depression ( BDI score > 40 ) and/or suicidal ideation . These individual receive appropriate medical followup psychological management . Active skin infection plan injection site ( ) .
